title: Is this serious?
body:
https://i.gyazo.com/0ee9e5c1f53c977acd0ba73a81fd472d.png

Why is the OCE store using USD and why in God's name is that $120 USD ($153AUD)? That's asinine. That probably cost $15 to make.

replies.body: Lol i wonder how many they have sold to AUS

When I can buy a Slayer hoodie for NZ$30 ($21 US), why would I even consider such a purchase?

Slayer > Lee Sin any day of the week.
